data.name: Moon Knight
data.description: Returned to life by the god Khonshu, Moon Knight battles criminals and his own shattered psyche using random status effects.

starItems.name: Moon Knight
starItems.description: Returned to life by the god Khonshu, Moon Knight battles criminals and his own shattered psyche using random status effects.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain a random positive effect from this list:
<color=#fff568>Counter</color>
<color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>
<color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> characters.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on any target that has a negative effect.

This attack cannot be Blocked.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on any target that has a negative effect.

This attack cannot be Blocked.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on any target that has a negative effect.

This attack cannot be Blocked.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all attacks
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on any target that has a negative effect.

This attack cannot be Blocked.

5.description:

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on any target that has a negative effect.

6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all attacks

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on any target that has a negative effect.

This attack cannot be Blocked.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color>-<color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional negative effects to each enemy from this list:
<color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color>-<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus for this attack.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color>-<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each enemy

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color>-<color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional negative effects to each enemy from this list:
<color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color>-<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus for this attack.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack clears <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each enemy.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color>-<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply random negative effects
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack clears <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on each enemy.

<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to apply up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional negative effects to each enemy from this list:
<color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

+<color=#86e619>70%</color>-<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>20%</color>-<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color>-<color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to apply up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional negative effects to each enemy from this list:
<color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack clears <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on each enemy.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color>-<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to apply random negative effects

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color>-<color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional negative effects to each enemy from this list:
<color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Apply negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>380%</color>-<color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply up to <color=#86e619>3</color> additional negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to each enemy from this list:
<color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color>-<color=#86e619>200%</color> Focus for this attack.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack clears all positive effect on each enemy.

1.description:
This character cannot Block.
On any character's turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, flip them to <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

2.description:
This character cannot Block.
On any character's turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, flip them to <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage

3.description:
This character cannot Block.
On any character's turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, flip them to <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.

4.description:
This character cannot Block.
On any character's turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, flip them to <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage Reduction.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health

5.description:
This character cannot Block.
On any character's turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, flip them to <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage Reduction.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>SHADOWLAND</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
